chunk:
True Botanicals Renew Nourishing Cleanser

Brand: True Botanicals

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: camellia sinensis (green tea) leaf extract*, glycerin (vegetable glycerin)*, camellia oleifera (tea) seed oil*, aloe barbadensis (aloe vera) leaf juice*, lauryl lactyl lactate (naturally derived surfactant), caprylyl/capryl glucoside (from veg

glucoside (from vegetable derived fatty acids & glucose), cocamidopropyl hydroxysultaine (from coconut), xanthan gum, phenethyl alcohol**, ethylhexylglycerin**, camellia sinensis (white tea) leaf extract, water, citric acid, lavandula hybrida (lavender) oil, citrus grandis (grapefruit) peel oil, andropogon zizanioides (vetiver) root oil, jasminum

root oil, jasminum sambac (jasmine) oil

Directions: \"
